description: A simple wrapper to apply `List` styles to an `Icon` or `SvgIcon`.

children.description:
The content of the component, normally `Icon`, `SvgIcon`,
or a `@material-ui/icons` SVG icon element.

classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

name: ListItemIcon

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.alignItemsFlexStart: Styles applied to the root element when the parent `ListItem` uses `alignItems="flex-start"`.
